sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

education_years.Description: Number of completed years of educations, starting from the primary school, as reported by the participant

proficiency_cambridge.Description: Participants' score on General English Test by Cambridge Assessment

proficiency_lextale.Description: Participants' score on Lextale test (Lemhöfer & Broersma, 2012)

raven_score.Description: Participants' score on a short version of the Raven’s Progressive Matrices test (only uneven items)

L1_AoA_learn.Description: Passive Age of Acqusition of L1: age at which participants were first exposed to L1 and started to learn this language

L1_AoA_use.Description: Active Age of Acqusition of L1: age at which participants were able to use the language (read a text, have a simple conversation)

L1_Active_use.Description: Percent of time during an average day when participants actively use (speak or write) their L1
L1_Active_use.Units: percent of time during a day

L1_Passive_use.Description: Percent of time during an average day when participants passively use (watch TV, read, listen to music / podcasts etc) their L1
L1_Passive_use.Units: percent of time during a day

L2_AoA_learn.Description: Passive Age of Acqusition of L2: age at which participants were first exposed to L1 and started to learn this language

L2_AoA_use.Description: Active Age of Acqusition of L2: age at which participants were able to use the language (read a text, have a simple conversation)

L2_Active_use.Description: Percent of time during an average day when participants actively use (speak or write) their L2
L2_Active_use.Units: percent of time during a day

L2_Passive_use.Description: Percent of time during an average day when participants passively use (watch TV, read, listen to music / podcasts etc) their L2
L2_Passive_use.Units: percent of time during a day
